wikipedia_page.main: Dr. Sarah A. Radcliffe  (born 1960) is Professor in Latin American Geography at the University of Cambridge and a fellow of Christ's College, Cambridge. She is an editor at the Progress in Human Geography journal. In 2020 she was elected a Fellow of the British Academy.
